mapper.select: SELECT r.report_id, r.reported_post_id, r.reported_comment_id, r.reporter_user_id, r.reported_user_id, r.report_content, r.report_type_id, r.report_content_type, r.report_status, r.create_at, rt.type_name, p.post_title, p.post_content, c.comment FROM tb_report r LEFT JOIN tb_report_type rt ON r.report_type_id = rt.report_type_id LEFT JOIN tb_post p ON r.reported_post_id = p.post_id LEFT JOIN tb_comment c ON r.reported_comment_id = c.comment_id ORDER BY r.create_at DESC

SELECT r.report_id, r.reported_post_id, r.reported_comment_id, r.reporter_user_id, r.reported_user_id, r.report_content, r.report_type_id, r.report_content_type, r.report_status, r.create_at, rt.type_name, p.post_title, p.post_content, c.comment FROM tb_report r LEFT JOIN tb_report_type rt ON r.report_type_id = rt.report_type_id LEFT JOIN tb_post p ON r.reported_post_id = p.post_id LEFT JOIN tb_comment c ON r.reported_comment_id = c.comment_id WHERE r.report_id = #{reportId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_report ( reported_post_id, reported_comment_id, reporter_user_id, reported_user_id, report_content, report_type_id, report_content_type, report_status, create_at ) VALUES ( #{reportedPostId}, #{reportedCommentId}, #{reporterUserId}, #{reportedUserId}, #{reportContent}, #{reportTypeId}, #{reportContentType}, #{reportStatus}, NOW() )
